blocks.name: crcl
blocks.content: Extend class notation with reflexive closure.

blocks.name: diff.crcl.s
diff.crcl.c
diff.crcl.w
df-rcl
blocks.content: Reflexive closure of a relation. This is the smallest superset which has the reflexive property. (Contributed by RP, 5-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: dfrcl2
blocks.content: Reflexive closure of a relation as union with restricted identity relation. (Contributed by RP, 6-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: dfrcl3
blocks.content: Reflexive closure of a relation as union of powers of the relation. (Contributed by RP, 6-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: dfrcl4
blocks.content: Reflexive closure of a relation as indexed union of powers of the relation. (Contributed by RP, 8-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfrcl4(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wceq(crcl, cmpt(s0, universe, ciun(s1, cpr(nat0, nat1), co(cv(s0), crelexp, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  eqtr4i(crcl, cmpt(s0, universe, ciun(s1, cpr(nat0, nat1), co(cv(s0), crelexp, cv(s1)))), cmpt(s0, universe, cun(co(cv(s0), crelexp, nat0), co(cv(s0), crelexp, nat1))))
  dfrcl3(s0)
  mpteq2i(s0, universe, ciun(s1, cpr(nat0, nat1), co(cv(s0), crelexp, cv(s1))), cun(co(cv(s0), crelexp, nat0), co(cv(s0), crelexp, nat1)))
  3eqtri(ciun(s1, cpr(nat0, nat1), co(cv(s0), crelexp, cv(s1))), cun(co(cv(s0), crelexp, nat0), co(cv(s0), crelexp, nat1)), ciun(s1, cun(csn(nat0), csn(nat1)), co(cv(s0), crelexp, cv(s1))), cun(ciun(s1, csn(nat0), co(cv(s0), crelexp, cv(s1))), ciun(s1, csn(nat1), co(cv(s0), crelexp, cv(s1)))))
  ax-mp(wceq(ciun(s1, cpr(nat0, nat1), co(cv(s0), crelexp, cv(s1))), ciun(s1, cun(csn(nat0), csn(nat1)), co(cv(s0), crelexp, cv(s1)))), wceq(cpr(nat0, nat1), cun(csn(nat0), csn(nat1))))
  df-pr(nat0, nat1)
  iuneq1(s1, cpr(nat0, nat1), cun(csn(nat0), csn(nat1)), co(cv(s0), crelexp, cv(s1)))
  iunxun(s1, csn(nat0), csn(nat1), co(cv(s0), crelexp, cv(s1)))
  uneq12i(ciun(s1, csn(nat0), co(cv(s0), crelexp, cv(s1))), ciun(s1, csn(nat1), co(cv(s0), crelexp, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), crelexp, nat0), co(cv(s0), crelexp, nat1))
  iunxsn(s1, nat0, co(cv(s0), crelexp, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), crelexp, nat0))
  c0ex()
  oveq2(cv(s1), nat0, cv(s0), crelexp)
  iunxsn(s1, nat1, co(cv(s0), crelexp, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), crelexp, nat1))
  1ex()
  oveq2(cv(s1), nat1, cv(s0), crelexp)
  diff.cpr.s(s1, nat0, nat1)
  diff.cun.s(s1, csn(nat0), csn(nat1))
  diff.csn.s(s1, nat0)
  diff.csn.s(s1, nat1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), crelexp, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), crelexp, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.crelexp.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
}

thm dfrcl4(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  âŠ¢ r* =(s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ(s1 âˆˆ { 0, 1 },(s0[^r]s1)))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  eqtr4i(crcl, (s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹ƒ(s1 âˆˆ { 0, 1 },(s0[^r]s1))), (s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦((s0[^r]0)â‹ƒ(s0[^r]1))))
  dfrcl3(s0)
  mpteq2i(s0, universe, â‹ƒ(s1 âˆˆ { 0, 1 },(s0[^r]s1)), ((s0[^r]0)â‹ƒ(s0[^r]1)))
  3eqtri(â‹ƒ(s1 âˆˆ { 0, 1 },(s0[^r]s1)), ((s0[^r]0)â‹ƒ(s0[^r]1)), â‹ƒ(s1 âˆˆ({ 0 } â‹ƒ { 1 }),(s0[^r]s1)), (â‹ƒ(s1 âˆˆ { 0 },(s0[^r]s1))â‹ƒ â‹ƒ(s1 âˆˆ { 1 },(s0[^r]s1))))
  ax-mp(â‹ƒ(s1 âˆˆ { 0, 1 },(s0[^r]s1))= â‹ƒ(s1 âˆˆ({ 0 } â‹ƒ { 1 }),(s0[^r]s1)), { 0, 1 } =({ 0 } â‹ƒ { 1 }))
  df-pr(nat0, nat1)
  iuneq1(s1, { 0, 1 }, ({ 0 } â‹ƒ { 1 }), (s0[^r]s1))
  iunxun(s1, { 0 }, { 1 }, (s0[^r]s1))
  uneq12i(â‹ƒ(s1 âˆˆ { 0 },(s0[^r]s1)), â‹ƒ(s1 âˆˆ { 1 },(s0[^r]s1)), (s0[^r]0), (s0[^r]1))
  iunxsn(s1, nat0, (s0[^r]s1), (s0[^r]0))
  c0ex()
  oveq2(s1, nat0, s0, crelexp)
  iunxsn(s1, nat1, (s0[^r]s1), (s0[^r]1))
  1ex()
  oveq2(s1, nat1, s0, crelexp)
  diff.cpr.s(s1, nat0, nat1)
  diff.cun.s(s1, { 0 }, { 1 })
  diff.csn.s(s1, nat0)
  diff.csn.s(s1, nat1)
  diff.co.s(s1, s0, crelexp, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, s0, crelexp, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.crelexp.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
}
